articles.title: Bollywood actor Sushmita Sen on her wedding plans, says 'I will get married' - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Talking about her heart attack in 2023, 1994 Miss Universe Sushmita Sen said she was taking baby steps in her fitness regime. Sen revealed that both her parents have heart problems, and it was genetic.
